00036 namespace lbann
00037 {
00038         class DataReader_MNIST : public DataReader
00039         {
00040         public:
00041     DataReader_MNIST(int batchSize, bool shuffle);
00042     DataReader_MNIST(int batchSize);
00043     DataReader_MNIST(const DataReader_MNIST& source);
00044                 ~DataReader_MNIST();
00045 
00046     int fetch_data(Mat& X);
00047     int fetch_label(Mat& Y);
00048                 int getNumLabels() { return NumLabels; }
00049 
00050                 // MNIST-specific functions
00051     bool load(std::string FileDir, std::string ImageFile, std::string LabelFile);
00052     bool load(std::string FileDir, std::string ImageFile, std::string LabelFile, size_t max_sample_count, bool firstN=false);
00053     bool load(std::string FileDir, std::string ImageFile, std::string LabelFile, double validation_percent, bool firstN=false);
00054     bool load(std::string FileDir, std::string ImageFile, std::string LabelFile, int *index_set);
00055     void free();
00056 
00057                 int getImageWidth() { return ImageWidth; }
00058                 int getImageHeight() { return ImageHeight; }
00059     int get_linearized_data_size() { return ImageWidth * ImageHeight; }
00060     int get_linearized_label_size() { return NumLabels; }
00061 
00062     DataReader_MNIST& operator=(const DataReader_MNIST& source);
00063 
00064   private:
00065     void clone_image_data(const DataReader_MNIST& source);
00066 
00067         private:
00068                 std::vector<unsigned char*>     ImageData;
00069                 int                                                     ImageWidth;
00070                 int                                                     ImageHeight;
00071                 int                                                             NumLabels;
00072         };
